# Canada
colonial_canada = {
	color = { 20 50 210 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 1
	native_size = 4
	native_ferocity = 1
	native_hostileness = 4
	
	trade_goods = {
		fur = 20
		fish = 10
		naval_supplies = 3
		grain = 1
	}

	culture = {
		inuit = 10
		cree = 10
		nakota = 2
		cheyenne = 2
		anishinabe = 2
		huron = 2
		iroquois = 2
		mahican = 2
		abenaki = 2
		mikmaq = 2
	}
	
	religion = {
		shamanism = 10
	}
	
	provinces = {
		1484 1493 1804 1105 1104 9549 9550 1807 999 4775
		2579 1805 14385 997 1905 2577 4770 2576 995 4759
		4760 1000 1002 2580 2589 4729 4754 1917 4728 991
		4757 1907 989 4738 4771 2581 2671 4737 4767 994
		992 988 4742 4755 2585 14355 1661 4736 4741 2586
		4747 4748 4744 4743 4734 4746 2670 4745 4735 1659
		4740 4739 4733 4756 4758 4768 990 4769 1490 2582
		4772 2583 4762 2567 2572 2571 4765 4776 5967 5969
		971 4779 4777 2566 2570 5968 4786 4782 4783 4780
		985 4784 4785 984 4802 4791 4794 4787 4790 4797
		4796 2569 4788 4789 4795 2568 983 4801 4781 4778
		4774 986 4773 2578 4799 4800 4808 982 4798 4807
		4804 981 4803 4805 2573 980 4809 4806 996 2574
		2575 4753 4752 4730 2588 1001 4732 2590 1003 4727
		4731 4724 1004 1806 4725 2015 4723 2592 1006 1811
		4719 4716 4717 998 4793 4792 5971 5972 4766 2565
		2584 4726 1007 2591 14306 4722 1908 2594 1005 4178
		1009 1665 4714 4713 1008 4706 4705 4709 4702 4703
		4710 4704 4707 4708 1010 1011 4715 4711 4712 4718
		4179 4761 2013 5974 5973 2595 1813 4690 2596 2597
		4686 4685 4687 2005 4689 4691 4692 4695 4693 2598
		14311 4684 4694 4681 4679 1915 4696 2599 4678 4674
		4673 4672 2600 4683 2018 2017 4677 4675 14310 4701
		1914 1812 4700 1923 4146 4688 4721 2593 4720 1486
		2587 
		3042 3043 3099 3108 3109 3110 3111 3262 2603 2604
		2606 1814 4665 14309 975 974 4667 2607 2605 4661
		4657 4658 4660 2003 2602 4662 2610 4663 4655 4652
		4653 4651 972 7614 973 4664 4656 4654 2609 2022
		976 7922 7921 7923 7927 2613 7926 14308 7936 978
		2612 14307 7928 7929 1810 7939 7940 7937 7942 7941
		7938 2611 977 7924 4698 4697 4699 2601 4680 2004
		4671 4676 4682 7610 7935 7934 7933 7930 7931 7932
		4668 4666 7925 4670 4669
	}
	
	# Specific
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				culture_group = french
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Root_Culture_GetGroupName_Canada"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				culture_group = french
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Acadia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = FRA
			OR = {
				any_owned_province = {
					OR = {
						area = highlands_area
						area = lowlands_area
					}
				}
				overlord_of = SCO
				alliance_with = SCO
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nouvelle_Écosse"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = BRU
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_REGION_New_Root_GetName"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Newfoundland"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Root_Culture_GetName_Quebec"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Laurentia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Borealia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
				tag = SCO
			}
			OR = {
				tag = SCO
				SCO = { exists = no }
			}
			any_owned_province = {
				OR = {
					area = highlands_area
					area = lowlands_area
				}
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nova_Scotia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = POR
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Lavrador"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = SCO
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nova_Scotia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = SCO
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nouvelle_Ecosse"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = IRO
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Kanata"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			culture_group = scandinavian
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Vinland"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = NED
				tag = HOL
				primary_culture = dutch
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nova_Hollandia"
	}
	# Generic
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Root_Culture_GetName_Canada"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_REGION_New_Root_GetName"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Root_Culture_GetName_Quebec"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Newfoundland"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Labrador"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Nova_Scotia"
	}

	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Laurentia"
	}
	names = {

	}

		trigger = {
			owns = 1010 # Manitoba
		}
		name = "PROV1010"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Hudson_Bay"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CANADA_Ruperts_Land"
	}

# Eastern America
colonial_eastern_america = {
	color = { 69 157 208 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 2
	native_size = 8
	native_ferocity = 2
	native_hostileness = 5
	
	trade_goods = {
		fur = 15
		fish = 3
		naval_supplies = 4
		grain = 4
		tobacco = 8
		cotton = 10
		sugar = 1
	}
	
	culture = {
		creek = 5
		choctaw = 2
		chickasaw = 2
		cherokee = 5
		shawnee = 5
		dakota = 2
		iroquois = 3
		powhatan = 2
		delaware = 4
		susquehannock = 5

		pequot = 2
		abenaki = 4

		shamanism = 10

# Louisiana
colonial_louisiana = {
	color = { 33 87 161 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 1
	native_size = 18
	native_ferocity = 2
	native_hostileness = 6
	
	trade_goods = {
		fur = 10
		fish = 1
		grain = 11
		cotton = 7
		iron = 1
	}
	
	culture = {
		nakota = 2
		dakota = 8
		chiwere = 3
		pawnee = 10
		osage = 3
		caddo = 6
		cheyenne = 1
		shoshone = 1
	}
	
	religion = {
		shamanism = 20
		animism = 20
	}
	
	provinces = {
		2528 6904 920 6918 6907 921 6933 6931 2529 6910
		6917 6911 6936 6939 6924 6923 6808 6806 6920 6928
		6934 1920 6937 6940 6927 6938 6941 893 6925 2530
		922 6809 6921 6919 6922 6807 6804 6912 6926 6916
		6908 6915 2532 6795 6793 6794 6792 6899 6914 6790
		6791 919 6913 6803 6898 6896 6894 6895 6885 6887

# California
colonial_california = {
	color = { 200 117 43 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 1
	native_size = 8
	native_ferocity = 1
	native_hostileness = 3
	
	trade_goods = {
		fur = 4
		grain = 3
		salt = 1
		fish = 1
		wool = 2
	}
	
	culture = {
		shoshone = 10
		piman = 8
		navajo = 1
	}
	
	religion = {
		shamanism = 4
		animism = 10
	}
	
	provinces = {
		979 3036 3037 3038 3041 2620 3105 3106 3107 2019
		7435 7575 7562 7551 7548 7549 7560 7563 2489 7547
		7555 7556 7557 7550 7559 7558 7552 4636 7546 7683
		7695 7697 7545 7678 7690 4637 7693 1808 14313 7679
		7688 7682 7680 7666 7675 7681 7677 7694 7554 7674
		7686 7689 7696 7701 7553 870 7687 7691 7685 7676
		2479 7673 4638 7672 7669 7671 7684 871 2480 7664
		7668 7667 7655 2481 7654 7656 7663 7653 7665 2483
		7589 7590 7661 872 7652 7651 7645 7647 7657 7642
		7643 7640 2482 7646 7658 7644 7617 7639 7650 7635
		7634 2485 7606 7637 7636 7609 7607 7649 7638 7608
		7648 873 2486 7641 2488 7627 7622 7628 7632 2487
		7629 7595 7596 7630 7660 7659 7631 7593 7662 7565
		7591 7573 7572 7571 7574 7569 2020 7570 7566 7576
		7582 7516 7524 1922 7577 7583 7581 7578 7579 7521
		7517 7520 7525 7529 2490 7518 7522 7530 7536 7519
		7539 7532 7531 7527 7526 7534 7537 7541 7533 7542
		7543 7540 7538 7535 7528 7523 7458 7584 7580 7585
		7587 7437 7436 7588 7433 7431 7429 7428 14312 7426
		7434 7594 7597 7430 1913 7427 7598 7626 7624 7618
		7619 7620 7621 4659 7625 7599 7623 7432 2006 7616
		7592 7561 7567 7586 7568 7564 7544 7699 2478 7702
		7704 868 4635 867 7705 2476 7706 8603 7698 14314
		7700 2021 7670 2477 7633 7604 7603 7601 7600 2484
		7602 7605 874 7611 7613 7615 7692 869 7703 4639
		4577 8611 2616 8622 8621 8620 8618 8612 8616 8610

		4634 875 7711 8619 4650 7710 4633 8617 8615 8613
		8605 8604 8614

	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
			}
			culture_group = british
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CALIFORNIA_Root_Culture_GetGroupName_Columbia"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GBR
				tag = ENG
			}
			culture_group = british
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_CALIFORNIA_New_Albion"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			primary_culture = russian
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_ALASKA_Alyeska"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = SPA
				tag = CAS
				tag = ARA
			}
			OR = {  owns = 978
				owns = 3047
			}
			NOT = { owns = 868 }
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_ALASKA_Pacifico_Norte"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {  owns = 978
				owns = 3047
			}
			NOT = { owns = 868 }
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_ALASKA_Alaska"
	}

			OR = {  owns = 979
				owns = 3049
			}
			NOT = { owns = 868 }
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_ALASKA_Aleutia"
	}
	# Generic
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_CALIFORNIA_California"
	}

		name = "COLONIAL_CALIFORNIA_Oregon"
	}

		name = "COLONIAL_CALIFORNIA_Root_Culture_GetGroupName_Columbia"
	}

	}

# Mexico
colonial_mexico = {
	color = { 231 181 12 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 3
	native_size = 8
	native_ferocity = 2
	native_hostileness = 5
	
	trade_goods = {
		fur = 2
		grain = 8
		salt = 5
		wool = 7
		fish = 5
		sugar = 8
		gold = 5
		cocoa = 6
		naval_supplies = 1
	}
	
	culture = {
		pueblo = 2
		navajo = 10
		piman = 5
		aztek = 8
		zapotek = 6
		yucatec = 3
		putun = 3
		highland_mayan = 3
	}
	
	religion = {
		animism = 10

				}
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_MEXICO_Yucatan"

colonial_colombia = {
	color = { 227 40 40 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 3
	native_size = 12
	native_ferocity = 1
	native_hostileness = 2
	
	trade_goods = {
		fur = 3
		cocoa = 7
		gold = 3
		grain = 4
		naval_supplies = 1
	}

	culture = {
		guajiro = 15
		inca = 6
	}
	
	religion = {
		animism = 10
	}
	
	provinces = {
		2662 9854 2661 9860 9869 9867 9865 838 9864 2660
		9858 1657 9863 9853 10039 9868 9862 9861 10038 9859
		9866 4592 9851 9792 837 9857 9856 840 2640 9779
		9778 9793 9787 4593 9781 9788 9780 9794 9850 9790

		9523 9527 9770 9769 9771 9776 9775 9774 839 9773
		2653 9524 9522 9525 9514 9512 9521 841 9526 9520
		9519 9518 9513 4587 9517 2638 4594 9791 9765 843
		4589 14390 2634 9768 4597 10040 2663 10042 836 4595
		2664 10046 10048 10043 10047 835 10049 2819 10045 4596
		4820 4821 4810 4812 4815 4816 4813 4599 4819 829
		828 4811 4814 4600 4817 826 827 4822 832 824
		823 4823 4607 4828 2818 4825 2817 4824 825 2806
		4818 8255 9852 9777 10041 10044 830 8272 822 4835
		2814 4832 4608 4829 4601 8296 834 8276 8274 8286
		8287 8289 8297 4613 8292 8293 8268 8267 2813 4609
		8270 8266 8263 4611 8264 8303 8305 8302 8260 8261
		8304 8259 8275 8280 2807 4610 8277 8279 8265 8262
		8288 8291 8309 8310 8308 8311 8307 2808 8301 8306

	}

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = SPA
				tag = CAS
				tag = ARA
			}
			owns = 223 # Granada
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_COLOMBIA_New_Granada"

# Peru
colonial_peru = {
	color = { 124 140 162 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 2
	native_size = 12
	native_ferocity = 1
	native_hostileness = 1
	
	trade_goods = {
		grain = 7
		fish = 2
		gold = 7
		cocoa = 2
		copper = 2
	}

	culture = {
		inca = 10
	}
	religion = {
		animism = 10
	}

	provinces = {
		2940 13851 13862 13846 13883 13885 13886 13898 13877 13858
		13861 13867 13869 13848 2839 2841 13897 13860 13878 13850
		13866 13899 13913 13859 13863 13903 13911 13882 794 13904
		13915 13912 13872 13901 13875 13873 13900 13874 13856 13864
		13857 13865 13876 13871 13852 13881 10091 10090 10079 2837
		13847 13849 10088 10086 10089 10087 10081 2838 2946 10078
		13987 2883 13988 13305 13996 13995 13990 13989 13914 13991
		13917 13927 14000 14009 13916 13918 14004 13993 13932 14056
		14014 2854 2842 14001 13884 13887 13854 13870 13868 13880
		13879 13808 2840 792 13905 13907 791 13891 13894 13925
		13926 13924 13888 13889 13921 13906 13893 13919 13892 13920
		13930 13931 13928 13945 13922 13944 13890 13909 2836 13910
		13908 13855 793 796 13807 797 10068 10074 10075 13309

# La Plata
colonial_la_plata = {
	color = { 101 102 163 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 3
	native_size = 12
	native_ferocity = 1
	native_hostileness = 4
	
	trade_goods = {
		grain = 15
		fish = 5
		gold = 2
		copper = 2
	}

	culture = {
		aimara = 6
		patagonian = 10
		chacoan = 2
		guarani = 4
	}
	religion = {
		animism = 10
	}
	
	provinces = {
		2940 13851 13862 13846 13883 13885 13886 13898 13877 13858
		13861 13867 13869 13848 2839 2841 13897 13860 13878 13850
		13866 13899 13913 13859 13863 13903 13911 13882 794 13904
		13915 13912 13872 13901 13875 13873 13900 13874 13856 13864
		13857 13865 13876 13871 13852 13881 10091 10090 10079 2837
		13847 13849 10088 10086 10089 10087 10081 2838 2946 10078
		13987 2883 13988 13305 13996 13995 13990 13989 13914 13991
		13917 13927 14000 14009 13916 13918 14004 13993 13932 14056
		14014 2854 2842 14001 13884 13887 13854 13870 13868 13880
		13879 13808 2840 792 13905 13907 791 13891 13894 13925
		13926 13924 13888 13889 13921 13906 13893 13919 13892 13920
		13930 13931 13928 13945 13922 13944 13890 13909 2836 13910
		13908 13855 793 796 13807 797 10068 10074 10075 13309
		13314 13312 13311 13994 13315 14103 2859 13310 14016 14058
		14082 14095 14101 14104 2858 777 14081 2853 2879 14106
		14111 14010 14080 14091 2878 14078 14097 14086 14057 14059
		14093 14087 14018 14083 14098 14090 14085 14089 14084 14079
		14096 14094 14007 14005 13999 14002 14008 14006 14017 14015
		13998 13997 14013 14012 14011 14003 14105 13350 14088 13992
		775 13313 13853 14107 14108 2855 14099 13351 13362 13361
		2884 13387 14114 14102 14109 14113 14100 14110 13349 13354
		13363 13348 13352 14112 13386 13390 13388 13308 13380 13715
		13307 13306 13716 776 799 10108 10084 10085 10077 10076
		1902 10083 2941 2942 10101 10102 10071 10099 10103 10104
		2834 2882 10110 10109 2881 13710 13384 13385 13355 13353
		13346 13358 13359 13347 13357 13356 14077 14055 14071 14073
		14076 14053 14052 14054 14318 14033 14051 13936 14028 13896
		14027 14030 13934 13933 13923 14029 13929 13935 13943 13938
		13939 13941 2843 13946 13947 13942 13940 13895 13948 13937
		13809 13953 2835 10073 10080 795 10082 10072 
	}
	
	# Specific
	names = {
		trigger = {
			culture_group = british
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Argentine"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = POR
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Rio_de_Prata"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			tag = POR
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Transplatina"
	}
	# Generic
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Root_Culture_GetName_La_Plata"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_REGION_New_Root_GetName"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			any_owned_province = { 
				area = paraguay_area
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Root_Culture_GetName_Paraguay"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = { # Amélioration la Pléiade
			any_owned_province = { 
				OR = {
					area = southern_chile_area
					area = central_chile_area
					area = northern_chile_area 
				}
			}
		}
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Root_Culture_GetName_Chile"
	}
	names = {
		name = "COLONIAL_LA_PLATA_Argentina"
	}
	names = {
		trigger = {
			owns = 772 # Uruguay
		}
		name = "PROV772"
	}
}

# Brazil
colonial_brazil = {
	color = { 57 160 101 }

	# Random New World
	tax_income = 2
	native_size = 8
	native_ferocity = 1
	native_hostileness = 4

		sugar = 13
		grain = 4
		fish = 1
		gold = 4
		tobacco = 3
	}

		guarani = 5
		tupinamba = 12
	}

		animism = 10
	}
